hero.subtitle: Empowering citizens to build safer, cleaner, and well-maintained cities through collective action
hero.description: We believe everyone deserves a city that works for them. Join us in creating responsive urban communities.

mission.title: ur Mission
mission.description: At FixMyNagar, we believe everyone deserves a safer, cleaner, and well-maintained city. Our mission is to empower citizens to identify and resolve public issues—potholes, broken streetlights, sewage leaks, and more—through simple reporting and collective action.

problem.title: The Problem We Solve
problem.description: Cities around India face recurring civic issues that go unnoticed or unaddressed:

issues.reporting: People don't know where to report problems
issues.response: Authorities respond only when enough complaints accumulate
issues.transparency: There's no transparency or tracking of resolutions

problem.conclusion: FixMyNagar exists to eliminate these barriers.

capture.title: Capture & Report
capture.description: Upload a photo & location of an issue in seconds—no forms, no hassle.

classification.title: Smart Classification
classification.description: Our AI identifies the category (e.g., road damage, sanitation, lighting).

community.title: Community Map
community.description: View reported issues in your neighborhood, upvote concerns you share.

escalation.title: Escalation & Transparency
escalation.description: Popular issues auto-escalate to local management bodies, keeping you informed.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Public visibility of all reports and their progress.

community.title: Community Voice
community.description: Empowering collective civic action through upvotes and feedback.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Seamless AI + geolocation for faster, smarter civic reporting.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: Ensuring authorities take action, every time.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Born from frustration and ambition, FixMyNagar started as a simple idea: "What if civic issues could be fixed as fast as we notice them?" As engineering students passionate about urban innovation, we built this platform to connect citizens, AI, and authorities in one intuitive ecosystem.

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.subtitle: Together, we can build more responsive cities.

actions.joinAppDesc: Start reporting issues in your area
actions.reportIssuesDesc: Make your voice heard in your community
